description.default: Specifies the Power Automate maker portal URL used to configure or trigger flows. This is primarily relevant for GCC (Government Community Cloud) environments. For non-GCC organizations using the standard environment, this value can be left unchanged.

label.description: Specifies the Power Automate maker portal URL used to configure or trigger flows. This is primarily relevant for GCC (Government Community Cloud) environments. For non-GCC organizations using the standard environment, this value can be left unchanged.
